item.description:
Album Boot Camp   6:00pm - 10 :00pm   5 Consecutive Weeks :
Monday, June 25th
Monday, July 2nd
Monday, July 9th
Monday, July 16th
TUESDAY, July 24th

Complete an album (or two!) in five weeks! That's right...COMPLETED IN FIVE WEEKS!! Album Making will never be the same! This Series includes instructional, hands-on lessons including the Power Sort and Power Layout techniques. During Boot Camp you will be encouraged and motivated to FINISH the project you're currently working on. Or...use this time to start and complete a NEW project! Come for one week or all five! Leave your supplies behind so you can pick up where you left off each week! $5.00 per session or $20.00 for all 5 (includes drinks, snacks and 6' space).

Boot Camp is limited to customers using Creative Memories albums.

Reserve your spot TODAY!!  Your pre-payment will guarantee your seat!
item.name: ALBUM BOOT CAMP
